name: ABAMobile
description: We are a company specialized in corporate mobility. Our mission is to help our clients define their mobility strategy and be their technology provider in mobility issues. The main added value that we offer our clients is our specialization in all the issues that have to do with the mobility applied to the business needs. The ABAMobile team has native development experience for the four main market platforms and HTML5.
